Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.answers

Interface Answer

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BuildMessage, ChallengerMessages, ColorMessage, ConnectionMessage, CustomMessage, DoubleMoveMessage, EndTurnMessage, GameError, LoseMessage, MatchStartedMessage, ModifiedTurnMessage, MoveMessage, PlayerLostMessage, RequestPlayersNumber, SelectSpacesMessage, SetWorkersMessage, StartTurnMessage, WinMessage, WorkerPlacement, WorkersRequestMessage
public interface Answer
extends java.io.Serializable
Answer class defines an interface for server answers. It's implemented by several messages, which represent a specific type of communication that the server would have with the client.
See Also:
Serializable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Object getMessage()
    Method getMessage returns the message of this WorkerPlacement object.
